questions.question: Highlight all flows connected to the North America DC to uncover its upstream material sources and downstream sales destinations.

answer.value: The North America DC has diverse upstream material dependencies and a dedicated downstream link to E-Commerce.

key_insights: North America DC receives inputs from both Assembly Line A and B, with a larger contribution from Assembly Line B.

reasoning.reasoning: This single tool action uncovers both dependency and specialization, providing a concise snapshot of the DCâ€™s strategic position.
